column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So I was forewarning about deep dish pizza not being so great
column2: but I still wanted to give it a try. I ordered the Malnati Chicago Classic deep dish pizza in personal size
column3: and honesty... I was not impressed. The pizza tasted a bit bland. Tomato sauce tasted very watery. The crust was probably the best part with fluffy breading and crispy edges. Nothing I would want to try again.
